attributes.action: ' fine' people leaving cars running whilst they are sat in them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is irresposnible of people to sit in cars whilst they are still running the engine.  This is increasingly apparent by parents waiting for children outside of schools. This must create so much pollution, for all engines left running around the country, when the cars are not actually being used.
